description:
http://anidb.net/ch1363 [Saeba Ryou] works as a sweeper — he sweeps crime off the streets. His partner, the tomboyish http://anidb.net/ch7965 [Makimura Kaori], deals primarily with the business side of things, and has a crush on Ryou, though she is reluctant to admit it. The clandestine City Hunter team is available for hire for missions like protection and private investigation, and Ryou has made it his policy to primarily take on jobs involving beautiful women. They can contact the team by writing the letters XYZ on a blackboard at the Shinjuku station.
Source: Wikipedia

REGULAR.description:
City Hunter Ryo Saeba tries to solve a rash of random shooting murders in Shinjuku.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iki na Sweeper XYZ wa Kiken na Cocktail
One Cool Sweeper! XYZ is a Dangerous Cocktail
粋なスイーパー XYZは危険なカクテル

REGULAR.description:
The daughter of a scientist who developed a deadly bacteria asks Ryo to kill her if she can`t create a vaccine before arms dealers capture her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Please Kill Me! Crosshairs Don`t Become a Pretty Girl
Watashi o Koroshite!! Bijo ni Shoujun wa Niawanai
私を殺して!! 美女に照準は似合わない

REGULAR.description:
Ryo takes on the case of a boxer who was shot to death just before a title match.

titles.title: Ai yo Kienaide! Ashita e no Ten-count
Love Don`t Leave Me! A Ten-count to Tomorrow

REGULAR.description:
Ryo investigates when a series of beautiful women are abducted in Shinjuku.

titles.title: Lady Vanish! Boutique of the Shadows

REGULAR.description:

titles.title: Koishinai Joyuu: Kibou e no Last Shot

REGULAR.description:
Framed for a deadly drunk driving accident by his former employer, the next prime minister, a man asks Ryo to help fake his suicide.

titles.title: A Gunshot to Set the Heart A Flutter! Sad, Lonely Girl
Kokoro Furueru Juusei: Kanashiki Lonely Girl
La petite fille sur la balançoire

美人に百発百中(ワンホールショット)?! 女刑事(デカ)には手を出すな

REGULAR.description:
Ryo is hired as a bodyguard for a casino dealer who gambles for her freedom against exploitative yakuza bosses.

titles.title: Leotard Bijo wa Tulip ga Osuki

A tutor from a war-torn country and her young charge take refuge in Japan, but secret agents are on their trail.

Saeko hires Ryo to be her bodyguard as she investigates a gym for engaging in human trafficking.

A young woman is targeted for murder after her wealthy father dies, leaving her the majority of his fortune.

A newbie flight attendant goes to her old high school friend Kaori for help when she discovers explosives in her bag.

When a popular swimsuit designer`s new designs are stolen, she hires Ryo to steal them back.

When threatening letters demand that a movie production be shut down, Ryo is delighted to take on the job of protecting the 20 young women who are auditioning for a major role.

Saeko tricks Ryo into protecting a rich old American friend of hers who`s on the run from assassins.

Ryo protects a runway model from would-be kidnappers.

Une mariée qui tombe du ciel

Ryo is hospitalized so he can protect a nurse who has suddenly inherited a fortune from one of her former patients.

愛ってなんですか? 獠の正しい恋愛講座

REGULAR.description:
Umibozu turns out to have a soft spot, as he`s been using an assumed name to send money to the daughter of his deceased friend from their mercenary days, but now she wants to meet him.

titles.title: Ryo & Umibozu`s Sweet Daddy Longlegs Story: Part One
Ryou to Umibouzu no Junjou Ashinaga Ojisan Densetsu (Zenpen)

A young girl hires Ryo to protect a children`s book author from her dangerous former editor.

When a wealthy adventurer goes missing in Alaska, his nephew hires Ryo as a bodyguard so he can stay alive long enough to ihherit his uncle`s fortune.

Ryo goes up against a master assassin who has come to Japan to assassinate the president of another country.

titles.title: Don`t Die, Ryo! - Hard Boiled Magnum

A mother drops her young daughter off at Ryo`s place with a note that the little girl is being targeted.

Ryo is hired as the bodyguard of a popular newscaster who is doing a story on the link between a major politician and the yakuza.

The college student stepdaughter of a wealthy industrialist has seemingly attempted suicide twice, but Ryo finds out that someone wants her dead.

REGULAR.description:
Ryo isn`t happy when the lackeys of a yakuza underboss plow into one of his favorite establishments with a bulldozer.

titles.title: Shinjuku Honor All The Way! The Kimono Beauty Wants To Be My Student (Part One)
Shinjuku Jingi Icchokusen! Kinagashi Bijin wa Deshi Shigan (Zenpen)

REGULAR.description:
The daughter of a yakuza boss becomes Ryo`s disciple, but also confesses to Kaori that she dreams of a normal life.

titles.title: Shinjuku Honor All The Way! The Kimono Beauty Wants To Be My Student (Part Two)
Shinjuku Jingi Icchokusen! Kinagashi Bijin wa Deshi Shigan (Kouhen)

After saving a young woman from a girl gang, Ryo learns that she`s amnesiac, only able to remember her name.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Princess From The Moon! Amnesia Give Ryo Headaches

Ryo teams up with an insurance investigator to retrieve a stolen diamond, the Smile of Cleopatra.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mokkori Partner! Irai Ryou wa Shower no Ato de
One Sexy Partner! After Shower Compensation
もっこりパートナー! 依頼料はシャワーの後で

REGULAR.description:
When a private investigator opens up shop next door, Ryo is startled to learn his new rival is Saeko`s little sister, a former police detective.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saeko no Imouto wa Onna Tantei (Zenpen): Passion Lady no Daitan Himitsu
Saeko`s little sister is a private eye! A passionate lady`s big secret (Part One)
冴子の妹は女探偵 (前編) 翔んだ女(パッションレディー)の大胆秘密

REGULAR.description:
Reika Nogami reveals to Ryo that someone high up in the chain of police command has yakuza connections and is responsible for her former partner`s murder.

titles.title: Saeko no Imouto wa Onna Tantei (Kouhen): Passion Lady no Dai Torimonochou
Saeko`s little sister is a private eye! A passionate lady`s big secret (Part Two)
冴子の妹は女探偵 (後編) 翔んだ女(パッションレディー)の大捕物帳

An orphaned best-selling poet seeks Ryo`s help after being constantly harassed by perverts recently.

Utako`s cookie anniversary! Moles on her chest and a love poem
女心のクッキー記念日 胸ボクロと初恋の唄

REGULAR.description:
Trouble brews after the two young brother`s of Ryo`s hairdresser find a bag of stolen money in an abandoned building.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kodomo 100-nin ni Kikimashita!? Ryou wa Bokura no Hero Da
We asked one hundred kids, They said, "Ryo`s our hero"
子供100人に聞きました!? 獠は僕らのヒーローだ

REGULAR.description:
The president of a company hires Ryo to guard his three daughters at a ski chalet while he goes off to complete a business merger that makes some people very angry.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sanshimai wa Maneku yo! Ryou-chan no Ski Tengoku
Three sisters are calling! Ryo`s skiing heaven
三姉妹は招くよ! 獠ちゃんのスキー天国

REGULAR.description:
Ryo encounters a pickpocket while out shopping with Kaori one day and both are shocked to see it`s one of Kaori`s old friends, who`s addicted to the thrill.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Picking pockets is a thrill! Pick Pockets for tomorrow
盗ってもスリリング 明日に向ってすれ!!

REGULAR.description:
When an explosion in a billiards hall leaves a hustler maimed, Ryo steps in to make sure the hustler`s daughter`s big game isn`t marred by her opponent`s "dirty pool."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mokkori ga Tokkouyaku!? Bijo Hustler to Ai no Kyuuseki
Mokkori is the Best Medicine ?! A Pool Shot to a Pretty Hustler`s Heart
モッコリが特効薬!? 美女ハスラーと愛の球跡

REGULAR.description:
Ryo is hired to safeguard the house of a young widow plagued by a thief, who keeps coming to raid her late husband`s fine art collection.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haru yo Koi Koi Miboujin! Saa Mofuku o Nuide...
O Spring Come Soon to Love`s Widow - Take Off Those Clothes of Mourning
春よこい恋未亡人! さぁ喪服をぬいで...

REGULAR.description:
Ryo helps a nun who lost her rosary while spending one drunken night of freedom before saying her vows.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mayoeru Sister: Mokkori wa Ai no Omichibiki!?
Sister in Doubt - Mokkori is her guide to love ?
Und führe mich nicht in Versuchung
迷えるシスター もっこりは愛のお導き!?

REGULAR.description:
The mafia organization responsible for Makimura`s death is back in Japan and their first move is getting rid of Umibozu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shijou Saikyou no Teki!! Ryou to Kaori no Last Match (Zenpen)

史上最強の敵!! 獠と香のラストマッチ (前編)

It`s Ryo to the rescue when Kaori is held captive by the mafia on a cargo ship in Tokyo Bay.

titles.title: Shijou Saikyou no Teki!! Ryou to Kaori no Last Match (Kouhen)
